EmailTemplate.name: 181112 Signum Invitation Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Following up... Invitation to Signum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Happy New Year! I want to invite you to attend Livongo's Signum conference this February. This one-day, invitation-only event will bring together thought leaders from healthcare into a meaningful dialogue around transforming healthcare for people with chronic conditions. We’re excited to have thought leaders like Daniel Pink, Hemant Taneja, and Seth Stephens-Davidowitz, as well as executives from Amazon, Walgreens, Delta, the American Diabetes Association, Anthem, Highmark, and Aetna.
The Village
969 Market St, San Francisco, CA
February 28, 2019
General Session: 8:30 AM - 2:30 PM
Clients Only: 2:30 PM - 6:30 PM
This is an event you won’t want to miss. Please be sure to register by January 11, 2019, to learn more about our new Applied Health SignalsTM category and how it is silencing Noisy HealthcareTM. To RSVP and to view the full agenda, visit livongo.com/signum or email RSVP@livongo.com with any questions. This invitation is non-transferable. If you would like to add someone in your place, please apply at RSVP@livongo.com.
Thanks, and we hope to see you in San Francisco!
[Rep Signature]
